name: Bone Devil
damage_resistances: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

actions.name: Barbed Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the attack is a melee attack against a creature  the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends  the devil can't use its barbed spear on another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The devil magically turns invisible  along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the devil makes an attack  falls unconscious  or dismisses the effect.

special_abilities.name: Devils Sight
special_abilities.desc: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

special_abilities.name: Lawful Evil
special_abilities.desc: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
